song.title: May your kingdom come
song.lyrics:
[C] May your kingdom come, May your name be always praised, Here on earth as in heavâ€™n, May your will be done today. The Spirit of truth Like a torrent pour on us, Pour your holiness on us, Build our faith, our hope, our love.
[V1] Who could come between us, Lord, And the love that you have for us? Who could turn away from You, From your tenderness, o Lord?
[V2] In our praise you come to dwell. You inspire us in our prayer. Lord, you draw us near to You. In your presence we are one.
[B] From evil Lord, set us free, Grant us your peace in our day ! Deliver us, from our sin ; Show us your mercy and grace ! Protect us, Lord, from all fear ; We wait in joy and in hope ! Your reign on earth is at hand : The coming of Jesus Christ.
[V3] So the Lord will be our light And dispel the night forever. On our lips will be his name And our tears will be no more.
